events.description:
Precise dating of the Crusades defies my ability
  * the force was multi-national and started at different times
  * the crusades were marred by and interwoven with the jealosies, 
    corruption, and politics of the times in which they occur.  Is a
    particular action *part of the crusade* or part of the secular politics of the era?  Did even the particpants (were they even honest with themselves) know the answer to this question?

events.blurb: Richard arrested by Austrians returning from the Crusade
